title: Empire.io
author: Empire.io
content: Howdy BitcoinTalk Fam!Delve into the Wild West with "Wanted Dead or a Wild" by Hacksaw Gaming. Wager 100 USDT and saddle up for 50 free spins by Monday. Kickstart your week with a bang!Steps to Join:Register/Login at www.Empire.io.Navigate to video slots.Play "Wanted - Dead or a Wild", ensuring wagers reach 100 USDT during the promo.Receive 50 Free Spins by Monday 18:00 GMT.T&Cs:Valid: Sat 23/09 0:00 - Sun 24/09 23:59 GMT.Only wagers on "Wanted Dead or a Wild" apply.Free spins will be credited by 18:00 GMT the following Monday.Free Spin wins to be wagered 20x in 14 days.Standard Empire.io terms apply.Original Announcement post here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5464593.0Act fast, limited offer! See you on the reels.
